amendment.description: Amendment to reduce the amount appropriated by $1,072,581,000. The reduction does not apply to the following accounts: 1) Accounts in title I; 2) "Other Department of Defense Programs-Defense Health Program"; and 3) accounts title IX.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the amount appropriated by $1,072,581,000. The reduction does not apply to the following accounts: 1) Accounts in title I; 2) "Other Department of Defense Programs-Defense Health Program"; and 3) accounts title IX.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A054) Agreed to by recorded vote: 247 - 167 (Roll no. 495).
